topic.title: Cyberpandemic incoming
topic.body: Will zeronet work if NWO try to takedown internet? Where in zeronet would be the best place to meet up..? Zerome? some board? Advice from more experienced zeronet users?

The Globalists will stop at nothing to get their "great reset".. One thing is 100% true - Its not about the virus anymore. The people are being duped.
